name: Sonic Speed X-Treme! v0.90 demo
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Space Bar & X to jump

                          WARNING

This is a Sonic fan game. not an official 

Sonic The Hedgehog 

Game.

Sonic The Hedgehog is owned by SEGA.

This game is still in development with

lots of glitches but don't worry we will

add a lot more updates soon so

Enjoy
